definition: A term used to describe an individual who possesses a strong belief in their own abilities, qualities, and worth. It is often used to refer to someone who displays confidence and self-assurance in various situations.

examples.german: Sie ist selbstbewusst und l채sst sich nicht leicht einsch체chtern.
examples.english: She is self-confident and not easily intimidated.

examples.english: He presents himself confidently in front of the audience.

examples.german: Er ist selbstbewusst genug, um seine Meinung zu vertreten.
examples.english: He is confident enough to express his opinion.

examples.german: Sie hat eine selbstbewusste Art, sich auszudr체cken.
examples.english: She has a self-assured way of expressing herself.
